body:
From @chuckatkins, The `package.py` for `paraview` unconditionally sets a number of `configure_args` for paraview to use various dependencies from other Spack packages (e.g.: `USE_SYSTEM_...`).  These arguments have been change in paraview since version 5.8.0 and need an appropriate code path in Spack's `package.py` file.

/cc @danlipsa
title: Installation issue: Paraview - Needs Updated configure args for @5.8.0:
